projects.title: Shopping Eye
projects.bodyText:
- A shopping mall navigation assistant designed to enhance the user shopping experience.
 - Features shop location finder with 3D visualization using Three.js.
 - Integrated AI-powered chatbot for real-time navigation assistance and smart location guidance.
 - Built using the **MERN stack**, with integrated APIs for live updates and information.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- A fully responsive and modern personal portfolio showcasing my projects, skills, and experience.
 - Developed using React.js and Framer Motion for smooth animations.
 - Integrated with EmailJS for direct contact and a dynamic projects section powered by JSON.
 - Includes a GitHub repository display, and real-time theme switching.
 - Hosted on Netlify with CI/CD integration for automatic deployments.

projects.title: DonatePath
projects.bodyText:
- A donation mobile application connecting volunteers and donors with organizations and individuals in need.
 - Features include public use profile, feedback and rating system, event creation, donations, volunteering.
 - Built using Flutter with Firebase Authentication and Firestore.

projects.title: Zero-Waste
projects.bodyText:
- A waste management system for monitoring waste collection and resource allocation.
 - Features include **QR**-based waste tracking, real-time peak monitoring, collector management .
 - Built using the **MERN** stack with **Design Patterns** implementation for peak monitoring.

projects.title: Book Reviewer
projects.bodyText:
- A book review web application where users can post reviews and ratings.
 - Features include authentication, review filtering, and user-generated content.
 - Built using the MERN stack with RESTful APIs.

projects.title: My Reminder
projects.bodyText:
- A simple reminder mobile app that allows users to set reminders for important tasks.
 - Features include reminder creation, deletion, and notification alerts.
 - Built using Kotlin with SQLite database for data storage.

projects.title: ExamineXpert
projects.bodyText:
- An online examination management system developed as an Java OOP project.
 - Features include test creation, tacking mcq exams and automated grading, .
 - Built using Java with object-oriented principles.

projects.title: Sky Fight Game
projects.bodyText:
- A fast-paced arcade shooter game built with Kotlin.
- Control a fighter jet and shoot down incoming UFOs in space.
- Enemy UFOs increase speed as the player's score rises.
- Simple but addictive gameplay with smooth animations and increasing difficulty.
- Developed using Android Studio with Jetpack components.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.
